org.hibernate.ogm.type.spi

Interface TypeTranslator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TypeTranslatorImpl

    public interface TypeTranslator
extends Service
    Translates Types from Hibernate ORM to corresponding GridTypes from Hibernate OGM.
    Author:
    Emmanuel Bernard <emmanuel@hibernate.org>

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GridType getType(Type type)
      Returns the Hibernate OGM type corresponding to the given ORM type.

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        GridType getType(Type type)
        Returns the Hibernate OGM type corresponding to the given ORM type.
        Parameters:
        type - The type from Hibernate ORM
        Returns:
        Hibernate OGM's corresponding type
        Throws:
        HibernateException - In case no matching type could be found
